response.original_title: Get the Lead Out with Tommy Giambusso
response.overview: Tommy "G" Giambusso has taught more people how to do lead came stained glass than any other glass instructor working today. His studio proven techniques will show you how easy and rewarding it can be. Join Tommy in this complete step-by-step video workshop and you'll be well on your way to creating your own leaded-glass masterpiece.  In this eighty-minute video, Tommy explains everything including the different profiles of lead came, all of the tools you'll need, how to set up your workspace, soldering, puttying, framing your piece and more.
response.tagline: A complete course in lead came stained glass
response.title: Get the Lead Out with Tommy Giambusso
